title: Pizza Night
eventText: We will host our first Pizza night this Saturday! Everyone is welcomed. We will introduce Esperanto while enjoying pizza and drinks!

title: Esperanto Camping
eventText: Meet up other esperanto speakers & Join us for this camping event in Woy Woy on 8th August!

title: Esperanto Book-club
eventText: Learn and improve your language skill, by reading and discussing books in Esperanto.â˜… Lernu kaj plibonigu vian lingvo-lertecon per legado kaj diskutado de Esperanto-libroj.

title: Esperanto Course
eventText: This course is for beginners and all level! If you are interested in Esperanto, come and join our class!
